p: The fungal strains were subcultured twice on Sabouraud dextrose agar before being tested. Yeast cells were washed four times in sterile saline. Each fungal suspension was taken from its frozen stock at –70°C. The strains were inoculated in 5 mL of Sabouraud dextrose broth, and then incubated under stirring at 35°C for 48 h.
